mapper.sql: id, dict_amount_model, dict_double_scheme, dict_lottery_type, double_count, dict_choose_scheme, dan_number, tuo_number, is_occupy, cash_out_rate, execute_index, recharge, balance, total_profit_amount, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config(dict_amount_model, dict_double_scheme, dict_lottery_type, double_count, dict_choose_scheme, dan_number, tuo_number, is_occupy, cash_out_rate, execute_index, recharge, balance, total_profit_amount, create_time, update_time) values (#{dictAmountModel}, #{dictDoubleScheme}, #{dictLotteryType}, #{doubleCount}, #{dictChooseScheme}, #{danNumber}, #{tuoNumber}, #{isOccupy}, #{cashOutRate}, #{executeIndex}, #{recharge}, #{balance}, #{totalProfitAmount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config
dict_amount_model = #{dictAmountModel},
dict_double_scheme = #{dictDoubleScheme},
dict_lottery_type = #{dictLotteryType},
double_count = #{doubleCount},
dict_choose_scheme = #{dictChooseScheme},
dan_number = #{danNumber},
tuo_number = #{tuoNumber},
is_occupy = #{isOccupy},
cash_out_rate = #{cashOutRate},
execute_index = #{executeIndex},
recharge = #{recharge},
balance = #{balance},
total_profit_amount = #{totalProfitAmount},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config where id in (${ids})
